OrgName.entry: COMMUNITY ASSESSMENT AND INTENSIVE SUPPORT SERVICE - CAISS

Desc.entry: An interdisciplinary team which works with adults with learning disabilities whose behaviour challenges their carers and/or services. Referrals are received via the Community Learning Disability Teams where it has been agreed that an individual may require further assessment or more intensive working to assist the individual to live in the community. Offers a city-wide service and works with people in their own homes, day services, residential or supported living accommodation. The team also works with carers and staff to provide training and support. Runs an advocacy group, Friday Aden and also offers Positive Behaviour Support Clinics, please contact the office for details.
